body.instruction: Select the image of each emperor to learn more about what they did during their reign.

front.content: Marble bust of Vitellius ©A. DAGLI ORTI / ImageQuest 2021

back.content:
I am known for:
  • ruling Rome for eight months total (April–December 22nd, CE)
  • the second battle of Bedriacum
  • being executed by Vespasian’s army
